title: Supply Route Anomaly Detection
description: An analyst must monitor traffic patterns on a main supply route to detect behavior indicative of a planned ambush, like the absence of normal traffic.

tasks.description: Use historical data to establish the normal pattern of life for the supply route, including typical traffic density by time of day.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst successfully models the normal traffic patterns.

tasks.description: Monitor the live traffic feed from a persistent surveillance drone.
Flag a sudden and complete lack of civilian traffic on the route as a critical anomaly, suggesting insurgents have blocked the road to set up an ambush.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst correctly identifies the 'negative space' anomaly and issues a warning to upcoming convoys.
